name: Block Breaker 3000
description:
Block Breaker 3000

A classic game reborn! Play casually to find your favorite levels, compete amongst friends for the master title by reaching the highest score or do speed runs. 

Currently the game has:

  • 10 Levels(2 bosses)
  • 5 Upgrades
  • 2 Downgrades
  • 7 Block types

All of this in amazing Unity's High-Definition Render Pipeline graphics.
